channel.title: [508] Project Trolling
channel.description:
[size=12pt]Will be using SB508 source for this project.[/size]
[b][size=24pt]Goals:[/size] [/b] [size=12pt]-To use Eventmanager instead of Process() -Create an economy server with almost all skills -Practice with multi-dimension arrays[/size]
[b][size=18pt]Update Log:[/size][/b]
[ul][li][size=12pt]January 6th, 2010[/size][/li][/ul]
[size=10pt] -Added My Own Shop Base (All Buttons work, item prices loaded from GeLoader.) -Added Full bank, Including tabs, withdraw x/deposit x, all but 1, etc.[/size] -Skill menus [size=10pt]-Added new trade base, everything works but remove-all(someone help me out on this?? lol)[/size] [size=10pt]-Private chat/Split Screen[/size]
[size=14pt]January 11th, 2010[/size] [size=10pt]-Amulet of Glory, Amulet of Glory(t) -Ring of Duelling, Games Necklace -Combat Bracelet[/size]
[size=14pt]January 12th, 2010[/size] [size=10pt]-Food Eating using eventmanager[/size]
[b][size=24pt]Pictures:[/size][/b] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/xn6jwx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/24433pe.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/29et9b5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/11awjnp.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/15hml2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/m9lpb4.png[/img][IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2wml7pd.png[/img]
[size=24pt][b]Programmers:[/b][/size] [size=14pt][b]Zack_Flowers N/A[/b][/size]
If wanting to contribute to project, add me on Skype and we'll talk it up.

item.title: [508] Project Trolling
item.dc:creator: @zack_flowers zack_flowers
item.description:
@zack_flowers wrote:

[quote=“Python_, post:9, topic:377199”][quote author=Lin link=topic=473109.msg3460960#msg3460960 date=1294472137]
I don’t get why you’re having trouble with remove all. If you have “Remove 10” working, just use the same code but use the number of items to remove to how many exist?
[/quote]

Oh I see what your saying Lin… It’s so simple I never thought about that…

/facepalm, lmfao…

http://www.motifake.com/image/demotivational-poster/0903/epic-face-palm-face-palm-demotivational-poster-1236742013.jpg

sb 508 already had all the features in your pictures, you really haven’t posted anything new…[/quote]
I know right? I thought I was the first person with a fully functional bank opening/closing…thanks for pointing that out…question mark

noobs are ftw:

So your going to follow tuts again?

Fyi I’m writing almost everything myself…The only thing that probably I’d leech is the combat calculations, like max hit…

So I’d appreciate if you’d say good luck…

Read full topic
